comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Bowling. Bah. If God had intended for us to bowl, she would've given us multiple digits and articulated limbs, all held in place by a ball and socket fastening system. While my chronically moist friend SB battles the limitations of natural design over in the UMC, I'll be slip-slidin' up the Four Pines trail. Yeeahoo! DU
